item.description:
RELEASE INFO: * Fix Irony not properly cleaning up its patch mod stuff * Various conflict solver analysis fixes and improvements * Various advanced merge fixes * Actually fix Linux updates now (they were still broken). If on Linux you might still manually have to download this update, sorry about that.
CHANGES FROM v1.7: * Various bugfixes * Upgrade dependencies * Show more information in hash report and optimize performance by switching to listbox controls * Hopefully fix GUI corruption in linux workspaces (without upgrading avalonia to latest version) * Update Stellaris parser map for Stellaris v2.8
